author: spencer_tb
content: Starting a thread, do we want this change in devnet 3 for 8024: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/11094

author: frangio_
content:
i'm opposed to this change and posted my arguments in https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/11094#issuecomment-3769076517

it's not captured there but a member of the solc team expressed the same concern about increasing the size of EXCHANGE instructions
